Translations.Text: Est patient in the face de their utterances remember noster servus David resourceful; he est obedient
Nos committed montis his service glorifying eum nox feria
Alias birds committed serve eum; totus est obedient to eum
Nos strengthened his kingship endowed eum cum wisdom bonus logic
Vos received news de feuding vir habuit sneaked his sanctuary
When they iniit his room he startled They dictus non Habet fear Nos feuding 1 alias nos seeking tuus fair judgment Non wrong nos guide nos rectus path
Hoc frater de meus suus 90 9 sheep dum ego suus unus sheep He wants mix my sheep his continues pressure me

He dictus He est unfair to vos de asking combine tuus sheep his! Multus people combine their properties treat each alius unfairly those believe work righteousness these est few Afterwards David wondered si he factus rectus judgment He thought nos testing eum. He tunc implored his Dominus forgiveness bowed down repented
Nos forgave eum in hoc matter Nos granted eum position honor nos beautiful abode

O David nos factus vos ruler terra. Ergo vos scabinus among the people equitably non subsequentis tuus personal opinion lest it diverts vos via DEUS! Surely those stray via DEUS incur severe retribution forgetting Feria Reckoning
